name: French Republic
startIntroPart2: After the Great War, France was considered a very powerful nation. Léon Blum and the popular front changed France radically.
declaringWar: France diplomates sent you a declaration of war.
defeated: We must capitulate, but the fight will never end.
introduction: We are the French Republic, birthplace of the Human Rights.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: With this Peace Treaty, it's peace for or time.
tradeRequest: We offer you some Bordeau wine and some Savoie cheese in a trade agreement.
uniqueText: Boost hapiness and production in all your cities.
